data.comment: Today's referee, Diego Montano Robles, has blown to start the match.
Free kick Guadalajara.
In the minute 3, Can Guadalajara capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Leon's half?
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 7, Diego Montano Robles awards the home team a throw-in.
Guadalajara have a goal kick.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 11, Leon to take a throw-in in Guadalajara territory.
Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guadalajara's half?
Throw-in for Leon in their own half.
In the minute 14, Leon are pushing forward but Joel Campbell's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
In the minute 16, Ball safe as Guadalajara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
Guadalajara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 18, Goal! Joel Campbell gives Leon a 1-0 lead in Leon.
That's a fine assist from Angel Mena.
Throw-in for Guadalajara at Estadio Leon.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Leon.
In the minute 20, Hiram Mier is booked for the away team.
Diego Montano Robles signals a Leon throw-in in Guadalajara's half.
In the minute 22, Throw-in Guadalajara.
Free kick for Leon in the half of Guadalajara.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Ball safe as Guadalajara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Guadalajara's Alexis Vega gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 27, Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Leon.
Angel Mena for the home team is judged to be offside.
In Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 29, Free kick Guadalajara.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Leon in the half of Guadalajara.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Guadalajara in the half of Leon.
Guadalajara have a dangerous throw-in.
Guadalajara pushes forward through Jose Macias, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 33, Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Guadalajara.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Leon close to the penalty box.
In the minute 36, Leon's Jean Meneses gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Guadalajara defender.
Leon have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Throw-in for Guadalajara in the half of Leon.
In the minute 40, It's a goal kick for the home team in Leon.
Throw-in Guadalajara.
Can Guadalajara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leon's half?
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Leon in their own half.
In Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Leon's Angel Mena has been booked in Leon.
In the minute 45, Guadalajara will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Leon.
Important block from the Guadalajara defence as Luis Montes fires in a strike for Leon.
In the minute 45, Leon have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Estadio Leon.
Alexis Vega (Guadalajara) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Jean Meneses for Leon has been booked by Diego Montano Robles and receives a first yellow card.
The second-half has started.
Diego Montano Robles awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Leon.
Diego Montano Robles signals a Leon throw-in in Guadalajara's half.
Leon to take a throw-in in Guadalajara territory.
In the minute 50, Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Leon.
Throw-in for Guadalajara at Estadio Leon.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 52, Diego Montano Robles awards Leon a goal kick.
Uriel Antuna (Guadalajara) gets in a great strike â€“ straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
In the minute 55, Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team have replaced Cristian Calderon with Jesus Angulo. This is the first substitution made today by Victor Vucetich.
The away team replace Alexis Vega with Oribe Peralta.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Leon in the half of Guadalajara.
Leon to take a throw-in in Guadalajara territory.
Guadalajara needs to be cautious. Leon have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Guadalajara are coming forward and Miguel Ponce gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leon.
In the minute 61, In Leon Leon attack through William Tesillo. The finish is off target, however.
Corner awarded to Leon.
Diego Montano Robles awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 63, In Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Leon's Jose Rodriguez breaks free at Estadio Leon. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Diego Montano Robles awards Guadalajara a goal kick.
In the minute 64, Alan Torres is replacing Jose Macias for Guadalajara at Estadio Leon.
Leon have a goal kick.
Victor Vucetich is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Leon with Fernando Beltran replacing Jesus Molina.
In the minute 66, Throw-in Guadalajara.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
Diego Montano Robles signals a Guadalajara throw-in in Leon's half.
In the minute 68, Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Leon.
Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guadalajara's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leon.
In the minute 72, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Guadalajara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Guadalajara.
Jesus Angulo (Guadalajara) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Leon have a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Victor Vucetich (Guadalajara) is making a fifth substitution, with Ronaldo Cisneros replacing Jesus Sanchez.
In the minute 77, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Leon close to the penalty box.
Leon's Angel Mena is on target but unsuccessful.
Can Leon capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 79, At Estadio Leon, Alan Torres has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Free kick for Leon in the half of Guadalajara.
Free kick Guadalajara.
In the minute 81, Throw-in high up the field for Guadalajara in Leon.
Can Guadalajara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leon's half?
Joel Campbell of Leon gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 83, Goal kick for Guadalajara at Estadio Leon.
Throw-in for Guadalajara in the half of Leon.
Guadalajara's Miguel Ponce misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 85, Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
Diego Montano Robles signals a Leon throw-in in Guadalajara's half.
Guadalajara's Oribe Peralta attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 86, Diego Montano Robles awards Leon a goal kick.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Leon are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 88, Juan Ignacio Gonzalez is replacing Jean Meneses for the home team.
Marcos Ignacio Ambriz (Leon) is making a second substitution, with Jose Godinez replacing Joel Campbell.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
In Leon, Isaac Brizuela of Guadalajara is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Guadalajara push forward at Estadio Leon and Miguel Ponce gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Leon defence.
Free kick for Leon in the half of Guadalajara.
Throw-in for Leon in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Leon!
Leon's Angel Mena gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Leon. But the effort is unsuccessful.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
Miguel Ponce (Guadalajara) has received a first yellow card.
Leon make their third substitution with Ivan Ochoa replacing Luis Montes.
